commentary: maxwell to gaikwad, four runsa 30-run over  slogged to deep midwicket, and there  a chance of a catch, but the ball falls just short of the fielding running in, and squirts behind him for four more  gaikwad unbeaten on 123, india finish on 222
second_commentary: maxwell to gaikwad, four, india finish with 222/3 in 20 overs  gaikwad spanks this over deep-mid-wicket and the fielder sprinting across only manages to get his hands to it, can't grab the ball though and india finish on a high

commentary: maxwell to gaikwad,  six runsthere  the hundred  fullish ball  steps forward and then muscles a shot over wide long-on  that  hundred in 52 balls  crazy accelerationsee all photos
second_commentary: maxwell to gaikwad, six, maiden t20i century for gaikwad  what a special moment as he takes off the helmet and celebrates it in style  has a wide smile on his face too  brings it up with a maximum over deep-mid-wicket and tilak walks up to him and congratulates him  not for the first time have we seen him play such a knock  has done this on several previous occasions in india  domestic circuit and in the indian premier league

commentary: hardie to suryakumar, outhardie with the big one  short of length ball around off stump  suryakumar attempts to get slightly low and paddle it over his shoulder in an unconventional way  gets the outside edge and wade collects to his right suryakumar yadav c †wade b hardie 39  29b 5x4 2x6 34m  sr: 134 48see all photos
second_commentary: hardie to suryakumar yadav, out caught by wade   edged and caught  a big wicket and hardie has broken through - shortened the length on this slower ball and hit the deck hard, suryakumar swivelled across and then swung, but he swung early, was through with the shot and the ball caught a big edge on its way to the keeper  wade throws the ball in delight and india have lost their captain  suryakumar yadav c wade b hardie 39 29  [4s-5 6s-2]

commentary: ellis to suryakumar, four runsfull ball on middle and leg  brilliant straight-drive past gaikwad, and mid-on  slide across the grass is in vain too
second_commentary: nathan ellis to suryakumar yadav, four, creamed, full and at the stumps, suryakumar leans forward, presents the full face of the bat and then caresses the drive between the non-striker and the umpire, beating mid-on  dive to his left

commentary: ellis to suryakumar, no rungood length ball just outside off  tries the cut  misses
second_commentary: nathan ellis to suryakumar yadav, no run, on a good length and angling across the right-hander, suryakumar has a poke at that and missed

commentary: t sangha to gaikwad,  2 runsmuscles this fullish ball to wide long-on  fifty stand
second_commentary: sangha to gaikwad, 2 runs, sangha dragged the length back on off, pulled away to the right of long-on and the two batters scamper back for the second

commentary: t sangha to gaikwad, four runsfull ball outside off  bit of turn away  skips down the ground and caresses a four through the covers  exquisite shot
second_commentary: sangha to gaikwad, four, cracking shot, gaikwad comes down the pitch, makes room and then plays a sublime drive, finds the gap past cover anbd the fast outfield does the rest

commentary: t sangha to gaikwad, no rungood length ball outside off  cut to point
second_commentary: sangha to gaikwad, no run, flatter and just outside off, punched off the back-foot to backward-point

commentary: t sangha to suryakumar,  1 rungood length ball outside off  cut to the deep
second_commentary: sangha to suryakumar yadav, 1 run, short and spinning away from wide of off, cut square past cover-point for a single

commentary: t sangha to suryakumar, no runfull ball on middle and leg  tucked with the turn to the off-side
second_commentary: sangha to suryakumar yadav, no run, sangha drags the length back on off, pushed off the back-foot to cover

commentary: t sangha to gaikwad,  1 rundriven down the ground and maxwell slides around at long-on to stop the four
second_commentary: sangha to gaikwad, 1 run, tossed up on middle and leg, driven down towards long-on for a single

commentary: hardie to gaikwad,  1 runfullish ball, fifth-stump line  punched to mid off for a single
second_commentary: hardie to gaikwad, 1 run, fuller length delivery outside off, driven straight to the fielder at mid-off for a quick single

commentary: hardie to suryakumar,  1 runfull and wide  slices a loft over the off-side  well short of maxwell at deep-point
second_commentary: hardie to suryakumar yadav, 1 run, short of a good length and well wide of off, suryakumar slices the drive over cover-point, on the bounce to the fielder in the deep

commentary: hardie to suryakumar, four runsplaced between fine-leg and deep-square-leg  suryakumar picks this length ball off his hip and gently guides it with the swinging bat behind square
second_commentary: hardie to suryakumar yadav, four, back-to-back boundaries now, short and at the stumps - suryakumar swivels across and then pulls it over square-leg, two men in the deep and he bisected them to perfection

commentary: hardie to suryakumar, four runslength ball outside off  plays a dangerous square-drive, but gets it past point who was the only catching fielder for that shot
second_commentary: hardie to suryakumar yadav, four, typical suryakumar shot, width on offer and he then flays the drive wide of point - the feet hardly moved, but he did open the face of the bat and found the gap square past point

commentary: hardie to gaikwad,  1 rungood length ball bit wide outside off  pulled to wide long-on  for those unfamiliar with hardie, he loads up like moises henriques with the ball, but faster
second_commentary: hardie to gaikwad, 1 run, back of a length and just outside off, muscled down to long-on for a single

commentary: hardie to suryakumar,  1 runa single off the first ball
second_commentary: hardie to suryakumar yadav, 1 run, fuller length delivery and well wide of off, suryakumar reached out on the drive and gets an under-edge that rolls past the keeper

commentary: t sangha to suryakumar,  1 runfull ball on middle  driven with the turn to the off-side
second_commentary: sangha to suryakumar yadav, 1 run, tossed up on off, pushed into the gap wide of cover for a single - 11 off the over

commentary: t sangha to suryakumar, four runsgood length ball around off  bit of extra bounce   sky tries to cut but ends up slicing it past the vacant slip region  fifty for india
second_commentary: sangha to suryakumar yadav, four, nicely played, pushed through quicker and just outside off - suryakumar backs away on the cut, gets a fine edge and the ball races away through the vacant slip region

commentary: t sangha to suryakumar, no runterrific ball  classical legspinner  ball  fullish ball just outside off, grips after pitching, turns away and sky misses the drive
second_commentary: sangha to suryakumar yadav, no run, beautifully bowled, a lovely leg-break from sangha - drifts in and spins away, teasing suryakumar on the drive and beating him on the outside edge

commentary: t sangha to gaikwad,  1 rungood length ball outside off  turning away  cut to deep-point
second_commentary: sangha to gaikwad, 1 run, dropped short and wide of off, cut away square on the off-side for a single

commentary: t sangha to suryakumar,  1 runfull ball just outside off  attempts a drive  inside edged to short-fine-leg
second_commentary: sangha to suryakumar yadav, 1 run, much better from sangha, was the attempted wrong 'un, slid on straight and catches suryakumar  inside edge on the drive, a single behind square on the on-side

commentary: t sangha to suryakumar, four runspoor, poor ball  tossed up full outside leg  sky gets low to sweep, and sweeps well enough
second_commentary: sangha to suryakumar yadav, four, poor start from sangha, full-toss wide down leg, all suryakumar needs to do is to get some bat on the sweep, he does so and sends it fine, beating the fielder in the ring

commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no runfull ball on off  plays the straight-drive but the ball holds its line and goes past the inside edge to wade  awfully close to off stump as well  gaikwad survives a close one and that  the powerplay wrapped
second_commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no run, beaten, on a good length and holding its line outside off - draws gaikwad into an extravagant drive and beats him on the inside edge, wasn't too far away from the off-stump as well

commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no runfull ball on off stump  opens the bat  face and plays to cover
second_commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no run, slower cutter outside off, driven straight to the fielder at cover

commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no runlength ball on middle with some extra bounce as the ball angles across  he mistimes a pull and drags it to mid on
second_commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, gaikwad swivels across and finds mid-on with the flat-batted pull

commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, four runsfull ball on middle and off  a controlled-front foot drive that goes straight-hit
second_commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, four, lovely, tad too full from behrendorff, gaikwad leans forward, presents the full face of the bat and then punches it straight past the non-striker, no need to run for those

commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no rungood length ball around off  nudged to point
second_commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, punched off the back-foot to backward-point

commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no runlength ball around off  gaikwad tries to poke at it  he  lucky that didn't take an edge to wade
second_commentary: behrendorff to gaikwad, no run, nicely bowled, behrendorff shortens the length and angles one across the right-hander, has gaikwad feeling for it and beats him on the outside edge

commentary: ellis to suryakumar,  six runsfull ball on leg  suryakumar spots the line early, shuffles onto the off-side, gets low, and then flicks it over fine-leg again
second_commentary: nathan ellis to suryakumar yadav, six, that  easy pickings and it  13 off the over, leg-stump half-volley from ellis - suryakumar gets inside the line and then whips it over long-leg for a maximum - the fielder at fine-leg was a mere spectator as the ball soared into the 1st tier

commentary: ellis to suryakumar, no rungood length ball around off stump  hurries onto sky  he drops his wrists and fends gently
second_commentary: nathan ellis to suryakumar yadav, no run, ellis shortens the length around off, defended to the off-side

commentary: ellis to suryakumar, no runfullish ball driven to mid on
second_commentary: nathan ellis to suryakumar yadav, no run, fuller length delivery at the stumps, driven straight to the fielder at mid-on

commentary: ellis to suryakumar,  six runsfull on off stump  moves to the off-side slightly and then uses his wrists to gloriously flick it over fine-leg  oozes class  and the crowd comes alive
second_commentary: nathan ellis to suryakumar yadav, six, cheeky and six - on a length and angling into the right-hander, suryakumar gets down low, watches the ball all the way, used the pace on the ball and then paddled it over long-leg for a maximum

commentary: ellis to gaikwad,  1 runfull ball on middle  flicked off his toes to deep backward-square-leg
second_commentary: nathan ellis to gaikwad, 1 run, fuller length delivery on the pads, whipped over backward-square-leg for a single

commentary: ellis to gaikwad, no runfull ball on middle stump and driven to mid off
second_commentary: nathan ellis to gaikwad, no run, fuller length delivery on off, gaikwad prods forward and defends it to mid-off

commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar, no rungood length ball on middle  nudged to the off-side
second_commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar yadav, no run, behrendorff shortens the length and cramps suryakumar for room on the cut, defended to the off-side

commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar, no rungood length ball on middle  tapped to the off-side  suryakumar nods as if to say that the ball bounced awkwardly
second_commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar yadav, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, suryakumar gets behind the line and defends it to the off-side

commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar, no rungreat channel  fullish ball around off and angling away a bit  attempts a drive but the ball goes past the edge
second_commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar yadav, no run, lovely, on a good length and angling away from the right-hander - drags suryakumar into the drive and whizzes past the outside edge

commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar, no runfullish ball on middle and leg  gently nudged to midwicket  he wants one but his partner turns it down  guess that happens when a batter has been run-out for a diamond duck in the first t20i  was a risky option anyway
second_commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar yadav, no run, on a good length and at the stumps, nudged in front of mid-wicket and suryakumar wanted a single, sent back by his partner

commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar, no rungood length ball just outside off  tries to offer the full face of the bat in a punchy shot down the ground  mistimed, and jason collects on the followthrough
second_commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar yadav, no run, behrendorff shortens the length on off, pushed back at the bowler who makes a half-stop on his followthrough

commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar, no runlength ball outside off  punchy shot to the off-side
second_commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar yadav, no run, on a good length and just outside off, suryakumar stays besides the line and pushes it to the off-side

commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar, no runlength ball outside off  punchy shot to the off-side
second_commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar yadav, wide, loose delivery from behrendorff, short and wayward, called as a wide

commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar, 1 widemore wide runs  this one slides across sky with behrendorff starting another over
second_commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar yadav, no run, on a good length and just outside off, suryakumar stays besides the line and pushes it to the off-side

commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar, 1 widemore wide runs  this one slides across sky with behrendorff starting another over
second_commentary: behrendorff to suryakumar yadav, wide, loose delivery from behrendorff, short and wayward, called as a wide

commentary: kane richardson to suryakumar,  1 runfull ball, awfully wide outside off  sky reaches out and drills it to point, who gets a hand to it and stops a boundary
second_commentary: k richardson to suryakumar yadav, 1 run, full and wide of off, would've been a wide had suryakumar let it go, but he reached out on the drive and placed it to the right of point - the fielder diving and making a half-stop

commentary: kane richardson to suryakumar, no runfull ball around off  driven to mid on
second_commentary: k richardson to suryakumar yadav, no run, fuller length delivery on off, suryakumar leans across and finds mid-on with the drive

commentary: kane richardson to suryakumar, no runcaught him on the back foot? lbw appeal - but turned down  length ball just outside off but jagging in and hitting sky on the back foot  height a big issue there, and the right call from the umpire
second_commentary: k richardson to suryakumar yadav, no run, half-an-appeal for lbw, but suryakumar was hit high on the pad, the nip-backer and he was beaten on the inside edge as he shuffled across, struck high on the thigh-pad

commentary: kane richardson to ishan, outslapped   straight to cover  length ball around middle and angling across  kishan confidently slaps the ball, but the extra bounce forces him to mis-hit  he failed to get on top of that shot, and its a soft dismissal inside the circle  gone for a duck ishan kishan c stoinis b richardson 0  5b 0x4 0x6 6m  sr: 0
second_commentary: k richardson to ishan kishan, out caught by stoinis   short and wide of off, and ishan kishan has slapped it straight into the hands of cover  - width on offer and kishan saw the chance of getting runs, but there  some extra bounce and he  mistimed the back-foot drive badly, popped in the air and into the big hands of stoinis, who doesn't miss out  ishan kishan c stoinis b k richardson 0 5

second_commentary: behrendorff to ishan kishan, leg byes, four, too short and too straight from behrendorff, on the pads and it beats wade on the right, came off kishan  pads as he looked to flick

commentary: behrendorff to ishan, no runlength ball knocked to the leg-side
second_commentary: behrendorff to ishan kishan, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, defended to the on-side

commentary: behrendorff to jaiswal, outjaiswal loses his shape, and wade collects the edge  length ball around off  jaiswal gives jason a charge and tries to hit him over cover  but he  awfully out of position, and wade sharply moves to his left to do the rest after the ball kissed the bat yashasvi jaiswal c †wade b behrendorff 6  6b 1x4 0x6 8m  sr: 100see all photos
second_commentary: behrendorff to jaiswal, out caught by wade   edged and caught  behrendorff strikes early once again, on a good length and shaping away from off, jaiswal charges down the pitch, makes room and looks to flay it over cover, gets a thick edge and wade does the rest, moving swiftly across to his left  jaiswawade b behrendorff 6 6  [4s-1]

commentary: behrendorff to jaiswal, no runshort of length ball just outside off  left alone
second_commentary: behrendorff to jaiswal, no run, on a good length and slanting across the left-hander, left alone

commentary: kane richardson to gaikwad, four runsno slip present - and that  going in gaikwad  favour  length ball on a fourth-stump line  gaikwad pokes at it, and the ball takes a thick edge before wade sees it fly past his right for four
second_commentary: k richardson to gaikwad, four, edged and four, that slip fielder would've gobbled it up with ease, but wade can only look in agony as the ball raced away - short of a good length and holding its line outside off, gaikwad has a poke at that and the ball finds the big edge

commentary: kane richardson to jaiswal,  1 runshort of length again  leg-stump line  attempts the pull but checks the shot at the last moment, instead rolling his wrists over it  to deep backward-square-leg
second_commentary: k richardson to jaiswal, 1 run, back of a length and angling across the left-hander - jaiswal swivels across and pulls it behind square on the on-side for a single
